subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chicago returned from a six-game trip with a 10-0-2 record, and its season-opening 13-game stretch without a regulation loss is three games from an N.H.L. record.
snippet: Chicago returned from a six-game trip with a 10-0-2 record, and its season-opening 13-game stretch without a regulation loss is three games from an N.H.L. record.
